|Poplin Shop|
[Super Mario Bros. Wonder](/Super_Mario_Bros._Wonder)( [2023](/List_of_games_by_date#2023))
- “Hi there! Here at the Poplin Shop, we sell everything! And we accept flower coins as payment.”
- —
[Poplin](/Poplin)vendor, [Super Mario Bros. Wonder](/Super_Mario_Bros._Wonder)
Poplin Shops in
[Super Mario Bros. Wonder](/Super_Mario_Bros._Wonder) are found throughout [Flower Kingdom](/Flower_Kingdom). The player can exchange special purple [flower coins](/Flower_coin) they collect in courses for various items. [Badges](/Super_Mario_Bros._Wonder#Badges) and [Wonder Seeds](/Wonder_Seed) can be purchased once (similar to [Power Moons](/Power_Moon) in [Super Mario Odyssey](/Super_Mario_Odyssey) before the credits), while [Standee Surprises](/Standee_Surprise?action=edit&redlink=1), [1-Up Mushrooms](/1-Up_Mushroom), and 1-Up Mushroom bundles can be purchased multiple times.
There are a total of eleven Poplin Shops set up around the Flower Kingdom. One of them is a "secret" Poplin Shop located in
[Sunbaked Desert](/Sunbaked_Desert) that sells three Wonder Seeds for varying prices of 50, 100, and 200 purple [flower coins](/Flower_coin). This shop can be accessed by going up the stairs and down the strip by the level [Break Time! Bouncy Tunes](/Break_Time!_Bouncy_Tunes?action=edit&redlink=1). Another is the Standee Shop in the [Special World](/Special_World) that, in addition to the standard Standee Surprises and 1-Up Mushrooms, sells character-specific Standee Surprises that always grant the player a standee they have not unlocked yet for that character.
